  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82375</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82375</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Les impulsions micro-ondes d'étoiles à neutrons en rotation</string>
            <string language="en">Microwave pulses from rotating neutron stars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrowelle Impulse von drehenden Neutronsternen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pulsos da microonda das estrelas de nêutron 
girando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impulsi di microonda dalle stelle di neutrone di 
rotazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σφυγμοί μικροκυμάτων από τα περιστρεφόμενα αστέρια 
νετρονίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pulsos de la microonda de las estrellas de 
neutrón que rotan</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre des signaux micro-ondes qu'on a d'abord cru être des signaux provenant d'extraterrestres mais qui plus tard ont été identifiés en tant que signaux issus d'étoiles à neutrons en rotation appelées pulsars.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows microwave signals first though to be from extra-terrestrial beings but were later found out to be from rotating neutron stars called pulsars.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la vie extraterrestre</string>
            <string language="en">extra-terrestrial life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">signaux micro-onde</string>
            <string language="en">microwave signals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">des pulsars</string>
            <string language="en">pulsars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile à neutrons en rotation</string>
            <string language="en">rotating neutron stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">SETI</string>
            <string language="en">SETI</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, Mikrowelle Signale zuerst 
zwar, von den extra-terrestrial Wesen zu sein aber war herausgefunden,
um von den drehenden Neutronsternen zu sein späteres, die Pulsars 
genannt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra sinais da microonda 
primeiramente though ser dos seres extra-terrestrial mas estava mais 
atrasada encontrada para fora para ser das estrelas de nêutron 
girando chamadas pulsars.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i segnali di microonda
in primo luogo comunque provenire dagli esseri extra-terrestrial ma 
era successivamente scoperta per provenire dalle stelle di neutrone di
rotazione chiamate pulsars.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σήματα μικροκυμάτων 
πρώτα εν τούτοις για να είναι από τα εξωγήινα οντα αλλά βρέθηκε
αργότερα έξω για να είναι από τα περιστρεφόμενα αστέρια 
νετρονίων αποκαλούμενα pulsars.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra señales de la 
microonda primero sin embargo de ser de seres extraterrestres pero era
más adelante descubierta para ser de las estrellas de neutrón que 
rotan llamadas los pulsares.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">extra-terrestrial Lebensdauer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrowelle Signale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pulsars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">drehende Neutronsterne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SETI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vida extra-terrestrial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sinais da microonda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pulsars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrelas de nêutron girando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SETI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vita extra-terrestrial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">segnali di microonda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pulsars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stelle di neutrone di rotazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SETI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξωγήινη ζωή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σήματα μικροκυμάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">pulsars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιστρεφόμενα αστέρια νετρονίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SETI</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vida extraterrestre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">señales de la microonda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pulsares</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">estrellas de neutrón que rotan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">SETI</string>
          </keyword>
